column4: can somebody help . I need to install 3c509 module as my old system has 3c509 Etherlink III ISA lan card. When I do "sudo modprobe 3c509" I get error: "FATAL: Module 3c509 not found." How can I install this module?
I do not exactly know what modules are and how to install them ...
acicula:: I do not exactly know what modules are and how to install them ... Is it preinstalled in Lucid? or I need to compile it and add it to Kernel ... Please guide me
i see the page you are following, try a "sudo find / -name 3c509" in terminal without the quotes to search your system for the module
